column5: The full report on my trip to Miniss Lake with Slate Falls Outposts is forthcoming, but I thought I'd share this video with you guys. It's more or less a highlight reel of the entire trip...https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zuoCdfUTHgI
Fantastic video/recap Your video producing is getting very professional!! Excellent content and quality Gets me pumped as the research and planning for next June is in the works Rick
Thanks for sharing Mike, great report.
Great photography Mike. I believe I was at that location years ago when Barney Ogilvie owned it. Great coloration on the pike and walleye. Looks like a great destination ..........thanks!

Mike I was on Miniss last year in September, we flew in with Hidden Bay Lodge, their cabins was south of your cabin. Great fishing, we didn't target pike that much, plenty of good quality walleyes! Thanks for sharing your trips with us!
Another awesome video and destination Mike! A quick question: How many lodges/cabins are on that lake? Slate Falls has two? and Hidden Bay has one? Are there any others? Thanks.

Just the three outposts. However, Miniss is accessible from De Lesseps lake where Guardian Eagle Lodge is located. I'd bet the guests don't venture into Miniss often though.There's also an outpost camp on Arc Lake, which is upstream of Miniss. I am not sure if Miniss is accessible from Arc, but it looks like it could be if someone really wanted to make the effort - there's definitely one good stretch of rapids you'd have to get through.
